question: Which country has discovered a new oil field in Khuzestan with 53 billion barrels reserve?
explanation: Iran has recently discovered a new 80m deep oil field in its southwestern province of Khuzestan with over 50 billion barrels of crude.The new oil field stretches nearly 200km from Khuzestan\'s border with Iraq to the city of Omidiyeh. It could become Iranâ€™s second-largest field after one containing 65 billion barrels in Ahvaz. Though, out of the amount at the new site, only a tenth - 2.2 billion barrels can be extracted due to technological limitations.
